customer_feedback: Communik8 is the worst company ever – I waited 45 minutes for my call to be answered and the customer service was useless!
My handset took two weeks to arrive, not the promised 48 hours, so I cancelled my order.
Coverage in my area is rubbish. I can’t make or receive calls, and the mobile internet connection is very patchy.
The staff at the Riverside store are incredibly rude. I needed help with my handset, and they laughed at me.
The website is a joke, and the only way to ask questions is through the chat. The responses are irrelevant and ungrammatical!
I’m still waiting for a response to the complaint email I sent a month ago. Going to cancel, been a loyal customer for 10 years.
I was charged twice in one month and got a debt collector’s letter when I refused to pay the bill.
I tried to cancel within the 14-day cooling-off period and was told it would happen automatically. It didn’t, now I’m tied into an unwanted 24-month contract.
